other_tests.findings: Increased F-18 FDG uptake (SUV max/H110056.53) in the right wall of the infrarenal abdominal aorta and periaortic space indicating active vascular infection.
other_tests.changes_over_time: One month after treatment, decreased F-18 FDG uptake (SUV max/H110053.61) in the same areas correlated with clinical improvement and normalization of laboratory findings, indicating a more rapid response compared to CT morphology changes. One year after discharge, nearly normalization of the F-18 FDG uptake was observed.
